about_the_game:
Cosplaying makes the world go 'round, including the Gamindustri dimension! The [Cosplay Series] Equipment Set brings your favorite Neptunia characters in awesome cosplay!

The [Cosplay Series] Equipment Set Set includes:
Weapons
• Cosplay Sword: Neptune
• Cosplay Blade: Noire
• Cosplay Hammer: Blanc
• Cosplay Spear: Vert
• Cosplay Cards: Chrome

Bracelets
• Cosplay Gloves: All characters
• Cosplay Bracelet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Cosplay Gauntlet: Neptune, Vert, Artisan, IF
• Cosplay Armlet: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa
• Cosplay Wristband: Noire, Blanc, Chrome, Compa

Accessories
• Cosplay Earrings: Neptune
• Cosplay Crown: Noire
• Cosplay Scarf: Blanc
• Cosplay Necklace: Vert
• Cosplay Belt: Chrome

*Note: Weapons are visible during battle and cutscenes. The Bracelets and Accessories are not visible on the character during battle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
